You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
B2B COMMERCE AND D2C COMMERCE
Product Category Promotion Examples

To create different types of promotions for products in a product category, use these discount and qualifier settings.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
Available in: B2B Commerce and D2C Commerce
CUSTOMER BUYS	CUSTOMER RECEIVES	DISCOUNT TARGET	DISCOUNT ADJUSTMENT TYPE	QUALIFIER	QUALIFIER RULE	EXAMPLE
Anything	Percent off products from Category A	Category A	Percentage Discount	—	—	Receive 10% off any product from the Imports category.
Fixed amount off a line item of products from Category A	Category A	Fixed Amount off Line Item Total	—	—	Receive a $10 discount on a line item of products from the Imports category.
Fixed amount off a product unit from Category A	Category A	Fixed Amount off Unit Price	—	—	Receive a $10 discount on a product unit from the Imports category.
Fixed price for any product from Category A	Category A	Fixed Price	—	—	Receive a product from the Imports category for $25.
Fixed price for a set of products from Category A	Category A	Total Fixed Price (Quantity limit required)	—	—	Receive two products from the Imports category for $50.
X worth of any product	Percent off products from Category A	Category A	Percentage Discount	—	Minimum Amount X	Spend $50 to receive 10% off products from the Imports category.
Fixed amount off a line item of products from Category A	Category A	Fixed Amount off Line Item Total	—	Minimum Amount X	Spend $50 to receive $10 off a line item of products from the Imports category.
Fixed amount off a product unit from Category A	Category A	Fixed Amount off Unit Price	—	Minimum Amount X	Spend $50 to receive $5 off a product unit from the Imports category.
Fixed price for any product from Category A	Category A	Fixed Price	—	Minimum Amount X	Spend $50 to receive a product from the Imports category for $10.
Fixed price for a set of products from Category A	Category A	Total Fixed Price (Quantity limit required)	—	Minimum Amount X	Spend $50 to receive 3 products from the Imports category for $20.
X units of Product A	Percent off products from Category B	Category B	Percentage Discount	Product A	Minimum Quantity X	Buy 5 units of Alpine Medium Roast coffee beans to receive 10% off products from the Coffee Machine category.
Fixed amount off a line item of products from Category B	Category B	Fixed Amount off Line Item Total	Product A	Minimum Quantity X	Buy 5 units of Alpine Medium Roast coffee beans to receive $20 off a line item of products from the Coffee Machine category.
Fixed amount off a product unit from Category B	Category B	Fixed Amount off Unit Price	Product A	Minimum Quantity X	Buy 5 units of Alpine Medium Roast coffee beans to receive $10 off a product unit from the Coffee Machine category.
Fixed price for any product from Category B	Category B	Fixed Price	Product A	Minimum Quantity X	Buy 5 units of Alpine Medium Roast coffee beans to receive a product from the Coffee Machine category for $50.
Fixed price for a set of products from Category B	Category B	Total Fixed Price (Quantity limit required)	Product A	Minimum Quantity X	Buy 5 units of Alpine Medium Roast coffee beans to receive 2 products from the coffee machine category for $100.
X worth of Product A	Percent off products from Category B	Category B	Percentage Discount	Product A	Minimum Amount X	Buy $50 worth of Alpine Medium Roast coffee beans to receive 10% off products from the coffee machine category.
Fixed amount off a line item of products from Category B	Category B	Fixed Amount off Line Item Total	Product A	Minimum Amount X	Buy $50 worth of Alpine Medium Roast coffee beans to receive $20 off a line item of products from the coffee machine category.
Fixed amount off a product unit from Category B	Category B	Fixed Amount off Unit Price	Product A	Minimum Amount X	Buy $50 worth of Alpine Medium Roast coffee beans to receive $10 off a product unit from the coffee machine category.
Fixed price for any product from Category B	Category B	Fixed Price	Product A	Minimum Amount X	Buy $50 worth of Alpine Medium Roast coffee beans to receive a product from the coffee machine category for $50.
Fixed price for a set of products from Category B	Category B	Total Fixed Price (Quantity limit required)	Product A	Minimum Amount X	Buy $50 worth of Alpine Medium Roast coffee beans to receive 2 products from the coffee machine category for $100.
X products from Category A	Percent off products from Category A	Category A	Percentage Discount	Category A	Minimum Quantity X	Buy 5 products from the Imports category to receive 10% off products from the Imports category.
Fixed amount off a line item of products from Category A	Category A	Fixed Amount off Line Item Total	Category A	Minimum Quantity X	Buy 5 products from the Imports category to receive $10 off a line item of products from the Imports category.
Fixed amount off a product unit from Category A	Category A	Fixed Amount off Unit Price	Category A	Minimum Quantity X	Buy 5 products from the Imports category to receive $10 off a product unit from the Imports category.
Fixed price for any product from Category A	Category A	Fixed Price	Category A	Minimum Quantity X	Buy 5 products from the Imports category to receive a product from the Imports category for $10.
Fixed price for a set of products from Category A	Category A	Total Fixed Price (Quantity limit required)	Category A	Minimum Quantity X	Buy 5 products from the Imports category to receive two products from the Imports category for $20.
X worth of products from Category A	Percent off products from Category A	Category A	Percentage Discount	Category A	Minimum Amount X	Buy $50 worth of products from the Imports category to receive 10% off products from the Imports category.
Fixed amount off a line item of products from Category A	Category A	Fixed Amount off Line Item Total	Category A	Minimum Amount X	Buy $50 worth of products from the Imports category to receive $10 off a line item of products from the Imports category.
Fixed amount off a product unit from Category A	Category A	Fixed Amount off Unit	Category A	Minimum Amount X	Buy $50 worth of products from the Imports category to receive $10 off a product unit from the Imports category.
Fixed price for any product from Category A	Category A	Fixed Price	Category A	Minimum Amount X	Buy $50 worth of products from the Imports category to receive a product from the Imports category for $10.
Fixed price for a set of products from Category A	Category A	Total Fixed Price (Quantity limit required)	Category A	Minimum Amount X	Buy $50 worth of products from the Imports category to receive two products from the Imports category for $20.
